pageSetting.title: 存量业绩人均认领分析

attribute.value: select dmz as key ,dmms as value from csb_dmms where dmmc='ZHLX'
select dmz as key ,dmms as value from csb_dmms where dmmc='ZHBS'

col.title: 支行实体行员人均认领余额
全行实体行员人均认领余额
支行实体行员人均认领余额
全行实体行员人均认领余额

select.isEqual: SELECT f.jgdh, f.jgmc, CASE WHEN f.rjye=0 THEN 0 ELSE(CAST(f.rjye AS DECIMAL(17,2))/CAST(h.jgsthyrs AS DECIMAL(17,2))) END AS zhsth, CASE WHEN f.qyrjye=0 THEN 0 ELSE(CAST(f.qyrjye AS DECIMAL(17,2))/CAST(h.qyjgsthyrs AS DECIMAL(17,2))) END AS qyzhsth, CASE WHEN f.rjye=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(CAST((f.rjye /h.jgsthyrs )AS DECIMAL(17,2))/CAST((f.qyrjye /h.qyjgsthyrs)AS DECIMAL(17,2)),2) END AS pld, cast(h.jgsthyrs as integer) as jgsthyrs, cast(h.qyjgsthyrs as integer ) as qyjgsthyrs, f.khdxdh FROM (SELECT b.khdxdh, b.jgdh, b.jgmc, b.rjye, SUM(rjye) over () AS qyrjye FROM (SELECT a.khdxdh, a.jgdh, a.jgmc, SUM(a.zhye) rjye FROM (SELECT jg.khdxdh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, SUM(ckzh.zhye) AS zhye FROM jxdx_ckzh ckzh INNER JOIN khdx_hy hy ON ckzh.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh INNER JOIN khdx_jg jg ON ckzh.jgdh =jg.jgdh WHERE ckzh.gxhslx='0' AND hy.hydh NOT LIKE '%XN%' AND ckzh.khrq BETWEEN $ksrq$ AND $jsrq$ AND ckzh.zhbs = '$zhbs$' GROUP BY jg.khdxdh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc UNION ALL SELECT jg.khdxdh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, SUM(ckzh.zhye*dxgx.zlbl*0.01) AS zhye FROM jxdx_ckzh ckzh INNER JOIN dxgx_hyyjgx_ck dxgx ON ckzh.jxdxdh = dxgx.jxdxdh AND dxgx.jsrq =29991231 INNER JOIN khdx_hy hy ON hy.khdxdh = dxgx.khdxdh INNER JOIN khdx_jg jg ON ckzh.jgdh =jg.jgdh WHERE ckzh.gxhslx='1' AND hy.hydh NOT LIKE '%XN%' AND ckzh.khrq BETWEEN $ksrq$ AND $jsrq$ AND ckzh.zhbs = '$zhbs$' GROUP BY jg.khdxdh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc )a GROUP BY a.khdxdh, a.jgdh, a.jgmc )b )f INNER JOIN (SELECT d.khdxdh, d.jgsthyrs, SUM(d.jgsthyrs) over () AS qyjgsthyrs FROM (SELECT jgkhdxdh AS khdxdh, COUNT(1) AS jgsthyrs FROM khdx_jgcy cy INNER JOIN khdx_hy hy ON cy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh AND $jsrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq AND hy.hydh NOT LIKE 'XN%' GROUP BY jgkhdxdh )d )h ON f.khdxdh=h.khdxdh WHERE f.khdxdh IN($jgkhdxdh$)

SELECT f.jgdh, f.jgmc, CASE WHEN f.rjye=0 THEN 0 ELSE (CAST(f.rjye AS DECIMAL(17,2))/CAST(h.jgsthyrs AS DECIMAL(17,2))) END AS zhsth, CASE WHEN f.qyrjye=0 THEN 0 ELSE (CAST(f.qyrjye AS DECIMAL(17,2))/CAST(h.qyjgsthyrs AS DECIMAL(17,2))) END AS qyzhsth, CASE WHEN f.rjye=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(CAST((f.rjye /h.jgsthyrs )AS DECIMAL(17,2))/CAST((f.qyrjye /h.qyjgsthyrs)AS DECIMAL(17,2)),2) END AS pld, cast (h.jgsthyrs as integer) as jgsthyrs, cast (h.qyjgsthyrs as integer) as qyjgsthyrs , f.khdxdh FROM (SELECT b.khdxdh, b.jgdh, b.jgmc, b.rjye, SUM(rjye) over () AS qyrjye FROM (SELECT a.khdxdh, a.jgdh, a.jgmc, SUM(a.zhye) rjye FROM (SELECT jg.khdxdh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, SUM(ckzh.zhye) AS zhye FROM jxdx_dkzh ckzh INNER JOIN khdx_hy hy ON ckzh.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh INNER JOIN khdx_jg jg ON ckzh.jgdh =jg.jgdh WHERE ckzh.gxhslx='0' AND hy.hydh NOT LIKE '%XN%' AND ckzh.khrq BETWEEN $ksrq$ AND $jsrq$ AND ckzh.zhbs = '$zhbs$' GROUP BY jg.khdxdh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc UNION ALL SELECT jg.khdxdh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, SUM(ckzh.zhye*dxgx.zlbl*0.01) AS zhye FROM jxdx_dkzh ckzh INNER JOIN dxgx_hyyjgx_dk dxgx ON ckzh.jxdxdh = dxgx.jxdxdh AND dxgx.jsrq =29991231 INNER JOIN khdx_hy hy ON hy.khdxdh = dxgx.khdxdh INNER JOIN khdx_jg jg ON ckzh.jgdh =jg.jgdh WHERE ckzh.gxhslx='1' AND hy.hydh NOT LIKE '%XN%' AND ckzh.khrq BETWEEN $ksrq$ AND $jsrq$ AND ckzh.zhbs = '$zhbs$' GROUP BY jg.khdxdh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc )a GROUP BY a.khdxdh, a.jgdh, a.jgmc )b )f INNER JOIN (SELECT d.khdxdh, d.jgsthyrs, SUM(d.jgsthyrs) over () AS qyjgsthyrs FROM (SELECT jgkhdxdh AS khdxdh, COUNT(1) AS jgsthyrs FROM khdx_jgcy cy INNER JOIN khdx_hy hy ON cy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh AND $jsrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq AND hy.hydh NOT LIKE 'XN%' GROUP BY jgkhdxdh )d )h ON f.khdxdh=h.khdxdh WHERE f.khdxdh IN($jgkhdxdh$)

sqlMap.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( SELECT f.jgdh, f.jgmc, CASE WHEN f.rjye=0 THEN 0 ELSE(CAST(f.rjye AS DECIMAL(17,2))/CAST(h.jgsthyrs AS DECIMAL(17,2))) END AS zhsth, CASE WHEN f.qyrjye=0 THEN 0 ELSE(CAST(f.qyrjye AS DECIMAL(17,2))/CAST(h.qyjgsthyrs AS DECIMAL(17,2))) END AS qyzhsth, CASE WHEN f.rjye=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(CAST((f.rjye /h.jgsthyrs )AS DECIMAL(17,2))/CAST((f.qyrjye /h.qyjgsthyrs)AS DECIMAL(17,2)),2) END AS pld, cast(h.jgsthyrs as integer) as jgsthyrs, cast(h.qyjgsthyrs as integer ) as qyjgsthyrs, f.khdxdh FROM (SELECT b.khdxdh, b.jgdh, b.jgmc, b.rjye, SUM(rjye) over () AS qyrjye FROM (SELECT a.khdxdh, a.jgdh, a.jgmc, SUM(a.zhye) rjye FROM (SELECT jg.khdxdh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, SUM(ckzh.zhye) AS zhye FROM jxdx_ckzh ckzh INNER JOIN khdx_hy hy ON ckzh.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh INNER JOIN khdx_jg jg ON ckzh.jgdh =jg.jgdh WHERE ckzh.gxhslx='0' AND hy.hydh NOT LIKE '%XN%' AND ckzh.khrq BETWEEN $ksrq$ AND $jsrq$ AND ckzh.zhbs = '$zhbs$' GROUP BY jg.khdxdh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc UNION ALL SELECT jg.khdxdh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, SUM(ckzh.zhye*dxgx.zlbl*0.01) AS zhye FROM jxdx_ckzh ckzh INNER JOIN dxgx_hyyjgx_ck dxgx ON ckzh.jxdxdh = dxgx.jxdxdh AND dxgx.jsrq =29991231 INNER JOIN khdx_hy hy ON hy.khdxdh = dxgx.khdxdh INNER JOIN khdx_jg jg ON ckzh.jgdh =jg.jgdh WHERE ckzh.gxhslx='1' AND hy.hydh NOT LIKE '%XN%' AND ckzh.khrq BETWEEN $ksrq$ AND $jsrq$ AND ckzh.zhbs = '$zhbs$' GROUP BY jg.khdxdh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc )a GROUP BY a.khdxdh, a.jgdh, a.jgmc )b )f INNER JOIN (SELECT d.khdxdh, d.jgsthyrs, SUM(d.jgsthyrs) over () AS qyjgsthyrs FROM (SELECT jgkhdxdh AS khdxdh, COUNT(1) AS jgsthyrs FROM khdx_jgcy cy INNER JOIN khdx_hy hy ON cy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh AND $jsrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq AND hy.hydh NOT LIKE 'XN%' GROUP BY jgkhdxdh )d )h ON f.khdxdh=h.khdxdh WHERE f.khdxdh IN($jgkhdxdh$)
SELECT f.jgdh, f.jgmc, CASE WHEN f.rjye=0 THEN 0 ELSE (CAST(f.rjye AS DECIMAL(17,2))/CAST(h.jgsthyrs AS DECIMAL(17,2))) END AS zhsth, CASE WHEN f.qyrjye=0 THEN 0 ELSE (CAST(f.qyrjye AS DECIMAL(17,2))/CAST(h.qyjgsthyrs AS DECIMAL(17,2))) END AS qyzhsth, CASE WHEN f.rjye=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(CAST((f.rjye /h.jgsthyrs )AS DECIMAL(17,2))/CAST((f.qyrjye /h.qyjgsthyrs)AS DECIMAL(17,2)),2) END AS pld, cast (h.jgsthyrs as integer) as jgsthyrs, cast (h.qyjgsthyrs as integer) as qyjgsthyrs , f.khdxdh FROM (SELECT b.khdxdh, b.jgdh, b.jgmc, b.rjye, SUM(rjye) over () AS qyrjye FROM (SELECT a.khdxdh, a.jgdh, a.jgmc, SUM(a.zhye) rjye FROM (SELECT jg.khdxdh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, SUM(ckzh.zhye) AS zhye FROM jxdx_dkzh ckzh INNER JOIN khdx_hy hy ON ckzh.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh INNER JOIN khdx_jg jg ON ckzh.jgdh =jg.jgdh WHERE ckzh.gxhslx='0' AND hy.hydh NOT LIKE '%XN%' AND ckzh.khrq BETWEEN $ksrq$ AND $jsrq$ AND ckzh.zhbs = '$zhbs$' GROUP BY jg.khdxdh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc UNION ALL SELECT jg.khdxdh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, SUM(ckzh.zhye*dxgx.zlbl*0.01) AS zhye FROM jxdx_dkzh ckzh INNER JOIN dxgx_hyyjgx_dk dxgx ON ckzh.jxdxdh = dxgx.jxdxdh AND dxgx.jsrq =29991231 INNER JOIN khdx_hy hy ON hy.khdxdh = dxgx.khdxdh INNER JOIN khdx_jg jg ON ckzh.jgdh =jg.jgdh WHERE ckzh.gxhslx='1' AND hy.hydh NOT LIKE '%XN%' AND ckzh.khrq BETWEEN $ksrq$ AND $jsrq$ AND ckzh.zhbs = '$zhbs$' GROUP BY jg.khdxdh, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc )a GROUP BY a.khdxdh, a.jgdh, a.jgmc )b )f INNER JOIN (SELECT d.khdxdh, d.jgsthyrs, SUM(d.jgsthyrs) over () AS qyjgsthyrs FROM (SELECT jgkhdxdh AS khdxdh, COUNT(1) AS jgsthyrs FROM khdx_jgcy cy INNER JOIN khdx_hy hy ON cy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh AND $jsrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq AND hy.hydh NOT LIKE 'XN%' GROUP BY jgkhdxdh )d )h ON f.khdxdh=h.khdxdh WHERE f.khdxdh IN($jgkhdxdh$) ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key ,dmms as value from csb_dmms where dmmc='ZHLX'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key ,dmms as value from csb_dmms where dmmc='ZHBS'
